attributes.action: Compensate those paying for quarantine if the Red List changes WHILST ABROAD.
attributes.additional_details: This has happened to many people from all walks of life. If someone has to quarantine because they have travelled knowingly, then they have to accept the consequences, but the Red List has been imposed at short notice on several occasions, making it very difficult to return home in time, particularly on the last occasion. In addition there is evidence that people in quarantine have actually tested positive from contact with "guards" in the quarantine hotel.
attributes.background: As it says, compensate those who have incurred large expenses to pay for their own quarantine.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you'd like the Government to refund all quarantine fees in these cases, or provide some other form of compensation. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.  You might also like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603746
